member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.SecurityAdministration
member.summary: Provides the ability to manage security for the application.

member.name: P:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.AllPermissions
member.summary: Gets all permissions defined for the application. This includes system and user-defined permissions.

member.name: T:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions
member.summary: Defines the names of the application permissions.

member.name: M:LightSwitchApplication.DataWorkspace.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a DataWorkspace. Changes can be made to data sources in the new instance independent of changes made to data sources in the default DataWorkspace.

member.name: P:LightSwitchApplication.DataWorkspace.ApplicationData
member.summary: Gets the ApplicationData datasource. This provides members to query and update data in the data source.

member.name: M:LightSwitchApplication.Cleaner.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Cleaner entity.

member.name: P:LightSwitchApplication.Cleaner.Application
member.summary: Gets the Application object for this application. The Application object provides access to active screens, methods to open screens and access to the current user.

member.name: P:LightSwitchApplication.Cleaner.DataWorkspace
member.summary: Gets the containing data workspace. The data workspace provides access to all data sources in the application.

member.summary: Gets the containing data workspace. The data workspace provides access to all data sources in the application.
